borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1, front garden, Magnolia soulangeana - 30% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by up to 2m. Cut back fromproperty to give some clearance. Retain a good amount of furnishing growth. All cuts to suitable growth points, leaving a natural looking tree. Final height = 8m and final spread = 6m		T2, rear garden, Olive (Olea europaea) - 30% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by up to 2m. Retain a good amount of furnishing growth. All cuts to suitable growth points, leaving a natural looking tree. Final height = 3m and final spread = 2m		T3 rear garden, Maidenhair Tree (Ginkgo biloba)	- 30% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by up to 2m. Crown lift all round to give 1.5-2m from ground level. Retain a good amount of furnishing growth. All cuts to suitable growth points, leaving a natural looking tree. Final height = 10m and final spread = 4m		T4 rear garden, Weeping Cherry - Remove select branches to alleviate some end weight as tree is leaning and heavily weighted on one side. All cuts to suitable growth points, leaving a natural looking tree. Final height = 3m and final spread = 3m		T5 rear garden - Elder (Sambucus nigra) - Remove select branches where appropriate. Remove select branches which are growing over neighbours property and Weeping Cherry. Reduce other select branches where it is not appropriate to remove, due to unbalancing the tree. All cuts to suitable growth points, leaving a natural looking tree.  Final height = 6m and final spread = 5m.To be discussed and reviewed with client at the time of works.
